PROJECT

Here is some of my practicing with a fun little project I've worked on. Want to see more? Github

Real-Time PATH train Departures

check my project

• Real-Time PATH train Web application

• User can change station for update real-time departures

• Using React.js, HTML, CSS, javaScript

• Using axios to send HTTP requests to REST endpoints and perform CRUD operations

Weather App

check my project

• Basic Weather web application project

• Using javaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and fetch data from openweathermap API

• User can get real-time update base on location

E-Commerce Best sheets store

check my project

• Ecommerce Web store with the ability to add and remove items to cart and make a payment

• Using javaScript, React, CSS, HTML, Material-UI.

• Using stripe and commerce.js for back-end.

• Deploy server with netlify.

News Letter Sign up

check my project

• A single page newsletter web application using javaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and Node.js

• Post data to Mailchimp's servers via their API.

• Deploy server with Heroku.
